Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: motivated \motivated\ adj. Having a strong motive; -- of people. Opposite of {unmotivated}. [Narrower terms: {driven, impelled}] [WordNet 1.5]
motivated adj : provided with a motive or given incentive for action; "a highly motivated child can learn almost anything"; "a group of politically motivated men" [ant: {unmotivated}]
